articles.title: Scientists have revealed the clearest ever image of Jupiter - Happy Mag
articles.description: The crystal clear image of Jupiter exists thanks to NASA's Hubble telescope alongside the Juno space probe orbiting the planet, and it is a vision.
articles.content:
Space is awesome. Luckily, we have science to reveal all the wondrous discoveries made beyond the Earth’s surface. Now, thanks to a technique called “lucky imaging,” we can see a super clear image of Jupiter.
